name: Pure Fun VR
description:
Welcome to Pure Fun VR! An immersive NSFW adult VR game. Meet Nina and her sister Brandy, they both share a secret. They like it when you watch them while they play.

Invite Nina or Brandy or both into any of the three non-judgmental scenes and explore your most intimate desires. Touch them, move them, pose them.

The game has been designed to keep your hands free. Move the sisters in any desired pose or use the preset posses as an easy starting point. Let them play
together or place them onto of you.

With the easy recording functionality you can set a start and stop position for the body, hands and feet and animate the sisters to do whatever you want.

Slide into their VR world and enjoy the following features:

  • Both have their own sets of toys which are animated while your hands are occupied with more important bits.
  • Grab the hand feet or waist to move them into any desired position.
  • Easy wrist access menu where you can change speed, poses and squirting
  • The game was built with physics in mind, body fluids will runn off your VR hands.
  • Breasts are gradably and will jiggle when moving
  • Genitalia will move if touched with your VR hands
  • Three Scenes available each with their own look.
  • Facial expression.

Have Fun!
